clues.text: Just like it "sounds", this electric toothbrush from Philips can give you healthier gums
You get an award if you tell us this term for a film of bacteria around teeth that the FDA says "begins gum disease"
From the Latin for "gums", it's an inflammation of the gums in which they bleed easily
Adjective for a tooth that's embedded in the jawbone or soft tissue of the jaw & usually has to be extracted
From the Latin for "around the tooth", this type of chronic disease is caused by bacterial infection
A Tulsa chorale adapted this holiday song, with valkyries for milkmaids & 9 ladies waltzing to Strauss
Nearly 200 Oklahoma singers united in song in 2005 to raise money for the victims of these 2 hurricanes
In 2005 the Oklahoma Master Chorale's "Hymns to Theotokos" featured songs dedicated to this biblical woman
The Council Oaks Men's Chorale of Tulsa wowed 'em in 2002 with their rendition of "I Feel Pretty" from this musical
In 2005 the Chorale at St. Joseph Old Cathedral in Oklahoma City sang this kind of "Mass for the Dead" by Mozart

This country emerged from isolation & agreed in 1854 to allow the U.S. trading rights to 2 of its ports
This runaway slave published his autobiography, "My Bondage, My Freedom", in 1855
This act of 1854 named for 2 future states allowed the new territories to decide the slavery issue themselves
This grandson of a founding father arranged an 1853 purchase from Mexico
This British inventor created a steelmaking process allowing large quantities of steel to be produced cheaply

rounds.category: THE NEW YORK TIMES OP-ED PAGE

clues.text: In 1986 this U.S. attorney & future mayor wrote on "How to Return Ethics to New York"
Lambasting Tom Cruise, Brooke Shields defended her use of drugs to treat this ailment of new mothers
His July 6, 2003 op-ed doubted Iraq's uranium purchase; 8 days later his wife was outed as a CIA agent
In political & journalistic circles, this op-edder's fame is such that she's simply called MoDo
His 2005 farewell column said, "Never retire!"; he kept his Sunday magazine language column
Wooden beams laid down to secure the rails of a railroad
To endow a group with the power to do something, like wear part of a 3-piece suit
Saloonkeeper Clarke & political satirist O'Rourke
For insulting me, you're going to get a "Van Allen" one of these in the chops
& for insulting my friend, you're going to get a "wind" one of these in the eye
A 1983 play about this fabled actress featured Scott Bakula as Joe DiMaggio & Will Gerard as Arthur Miller
On Nov. 17, 1968 Herschel Bernardi opened on Broadway in this role made famous by Anthony Quinn in a 1964 film
When this play opened in 1972, Jack Albertson & Sam Levene played comedians Willie Clark & Al Lewis
His most recent Tony Awards for best score were for "Passion" in 1994 & "Into the Woods" in 1988
Leiber & Stoller, composers of "On Broadway", made it to Broadway with this 1995 showcase of their music
On September 27, 1998, in his final at-bat, this Cardinal hit his record 70th home run of the season
On April 4, 1997 the new Turner Field opened with this home team defeating the visiting Cubs, 5-4
In 1997 this Jim Leyland-managed team became the first wild card to win a World Series
This Dodger won 27 games in 1966, but retired at season's end due to an arthritic arm
When this Brooklyn field opened in 1913, borough pres. Alfred Steers tossed out the first ball
In 1859 John Brown raided the arsenal of this town, now West Virginia's easternmost
Each summer Grandview State Park presents a play based on this famous feud
W. Va. has the highest average elevation east of the Mississippi, which may account for this official nickname
This current U.S. senator served as West Virginia's governor from 1977 to 1985
This river & its north branch provide the state's northern border with Maryland

The book "Fashionable Food" tells how to make a "truly awful" salad with a banana & this cinema snack

These fleshy growths that top roosters' heads are blanched, dipped in batter & fried for use as a garnish
Larousse reports that the moray type of this is served cold, with garlic mayonnaise
Secreted by sperm whales & found in perfume, this waxy substance is used as a spice in the East

rounds.text: Asked in 1966 to write a concise statement for arresting officers to recite, California D.A. Harold Berliner started with these 7 words
rounds.response: You have the right to remain silent
